sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row :scroll-target="onScroll" style="margin-bottom: 20px;">
      <v-card @click="scrollBottom" v-for="message in messages" :key="message.id" :title="message.name" variant="tonal"
        :text="message.message" style="width: 100%; margin: 10px 10px 10px 10px;"></v-card>
    </v-row>
    <v-text-field label="Wiadomość..." v-model="message" :append-icon="message ? 'mdi-send' : 'mdi-emoticon'"
      variant="filled" clear-icon="mdi-close-circle" clearable type="text" @click:append="sendMessage"
      @click:prepend="changeIcon" @click:clear="clearMessage"></v-text-field>
    <button @click="ping()"> {{ message }} </button>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import io from 'socket.io-client';

export default {
  name: 'MainChat',
  data() {
    return {
      bottom: '',
      message: 'chuj',
      connection: null,
      socket: io.connect(),
      messages: [
      ]
    }
  }, methods: {
    scrollBottom() {
      this.bottom = document.body.scrollHeight
      window.scrollTo(0, this.bottom);
    },
    ping() {
      this.socket.emit('ping');
    },
    sendMessage() {
      this.resetIcon()
      this.clearMessage()
    },
    clearMessage() {
      this.message = ''
    },
    resetIcon() {
      this.iconIndex = 0
    },
    changeIcon() {
      this.iconIndex === this.icons.length - 1
        ? this.iconIndex = 0
        : this.iconIndex++
    },



  },
  created() {
    this.socket.on('pong', function (data) {
      this.message = data
      console.log(data);
    }
    )
  }
}
</script>
